Title: An Act Changing the Name of Tandang Sora Elementary School in Barangay Talipapa, Quezon City, to Placido Del Mundo Memorial School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 785
An Act Changing the Name of Tandang Sora Elementary School in Barangay Talipapa, Quezon City, to Placido Del Mundo Memorial School
Section 1. Tandang Sora Elementary School in Barangay Talipapa in Quezon City is hereby changed to Placido del Mundo Memorial School in honor of Mr. Placido del Mundo, the philanthropist and civic-minded person of the said barangay.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
